# url

**Instance Property**

The address of the printer.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var url: URL { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property locates the IP address and resource path for the printer.

## Describing the printer

- **displayName**: A human-readable string that displays the name of a printer.
- **txtRecord**: A DNS TXT record to identify the printer.
